name: Anyone Guitar
description:
You can simply Touch, Strum and Tremolo six strings to play wonderful music as a guitarist. It is quite like playing lead guitar with a band of drum, bass, piano and other instruments.
Brilliant music covers genres: Rock, Pop, Blues, Punk, Metal, Funk, Folk, Surf etc.
Guitars are ready to be used: Les Paul, StratoCaster, SG, Flying V, Explorer, TeleCaster.
